file_content.text: Couldn't have gotten the drill running again without your help. Much appreciated.
Here. I have the parts you need.
Nice job. I'll let General Korvan know we'll have the drill up and running in no time.
Those Imps are in for a nasty surprise!
Soon as you get the parts we need, we can start drilling again.
You're a Jedi, right? Gotta be. Nobody else on this toxic rock dresses like that.
The soldiers assigned to Quesh are the best the Republic has to offer, but it's nice to know your order's backing us up, too.
Always good to meet another Republic soldier. If we're going to boot the Imps off this toxic rock, we gotta stick together, right?
You look like the kind of fella who knows how to get things done, right? I mean, why else would you be on this toxic rock?
You look like the kind of gal who knows how to get things done, right? I mean, why else would you be on this toxic rock?
The Republic only sends its best people here. It's nice to know you've got our back.
Name's Gallia, foreman of this crew. Listen, we could use a little help. General Korvan came up with a great plan to catch the Imps off guard.
You wouldn't be asking for my help if there wasn't a problem.
Did something go wrong?
You're a sharp one. I'll give you that.
If this plan's so great, why don't you get started?
So what are you waiting for?
Plans don't always work out.
What's the plan?
There's an Imp base near the mines. We can drill up into it from below so Korvan can launch a surprise attack. But we hit a little snag.
Blasted drill broke down. And there's only one place on Quesh to get the replacement parts we need.
Quit dancing around the issue and tell me what you want.
Get to the point.
This sounds dangerous....
Maybe we can work together.
I was hoping you'd say that.
Somebody needs to salvage the parts from a drill inside the Imps' mining operations.
I doubt they'll hand it over just because we ask nicely. Probably going to mean cracking some skulls.
I'll do what I must.
Looking forward to it.
Glad you're on board.
It's going to cost you.
Pay for play, huh? Okay, I can probably get General Korvan to authorize some credits or something.
Go to the Imperial mining camp and grab the parts we need from their drill. Then bring them back here to me.
Good luck. I'll be waiting.
I'm busy. [Refuse quest]
Nice attitude. Fine, I'll find someone else to help me.
Not a good time to talk.
